transArray.content: The location of the hotel is superb, quiet amidst the hustle and bustle, the busiest area in the city center. It is very close to shopping malls, convenience stores, and Sanlitun Taikoo Li SOHO. The environment is comfortable, the service is warm, and the self-service check-in is very fast and convenient. The hotel also has a self-service laundry room and a dryer, which are very easy to use, and I will be their loyal customers in the future!
